permafrost.tundra.server

Class ServiceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.ServiceHelper

  • public final class ServiceHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with webMethods Integration Server services.

      • respond

        public static void respond(int code,
                           java.lang.String message,
                           com.wm.data.IData headers,
                           java.io.InputStream content,
                           java.lang.String contentType,
                           java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                    throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Sets the HTTP response status, headers, and body for the current service invocation.
        Parameters:
        code - The HTTP response status code to be returned.
        message - The HTTP response status message to be returned; if null, the standard message for the given code will be used.
        headers - The HTTP headers to be returned; if null, no custom headers will be added to the response.
        content - The HTTP response body to be returned.
        contentType - The MIME content type of the response body being returned.
        charset - The character set used if a text response is being returned.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(java.lang.String service)
        Returns true if the given service exists in Integration Server.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to check existence of.
        Returns:
        True if the given service exists in Integration Server.

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(java.lang.String service,
                             boolean raise)
                      throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the given service exists in Integration Server.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to check existence of.
        raise - If true and the service does not exist, an exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        True if the given service exists in Integration Server.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the given service does not exist.

      • invoke

        public static com.wm.data.IData invoke(java.lang.String service,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Invokes the given service with the given pipeline synchronously.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to be invoked.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the service.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned by the service invocation.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If the service throws an exception while being invoked.

      • invoke

        public static com.wm.data.IData invoke(java.lang.String service,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                       boolean raise)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Invokes the given service with the given pipeline synchronously.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to be invoked.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the service.
        raise - If true will rethrow exceptions thrown by the invoked service.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned by the service invocation.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the service throws an exception while being invoked.

      • invoke

        public static com.wm.data.IData invoke(java.lang.String service,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                       boolean raise,
                                       boolean clone)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Invokes the given service with the given pipeline synchronously.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to be invoked.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the service.
        raise - If true will rethrow exceptions thrown by the invoked service.
        clone - If true the pipeline will first be cloned before being used by the invocation.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned by the service invocation.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the service throws an exception while being invoked.

      • invoke

        public static com.wm.data.IData invoke(java.lang.String service,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                       boolean raise,
                                       boolean clone,
                                       boolean logError)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Invokes the given service with the given pipeline synchronously.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to be invoked.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the service.
        raise - If true will rethrow exceptions thrown by the invoked service.
        clone - If true the pipeline will first be cloned before being used by the invocation.
        logError - Logs a caught exception if true and raise is false, otherwise exception is not logged.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned by the service invocation.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the service throws an exception while being invoked.

      • chain

        public static com.wm.data.IData chain(java.lang.String[] services,
                                      com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
                               throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Executes a list of services in the order specified.
        Parameters:
        services - The list of services to be invoked.
        pipeline - The input pipeline passed to the first service in the chain.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned by the final service in the chain.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an exception is thrown by one of the invoked services.

        Parameters:
        services - The list of services to be invoked.
        pipeline - The input pipeline passed to the first service in the chain.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned by the final service in the chain.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an exception is thrown by one of the invoked services.

      • fork

        public static com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceThread fork(java.lang.String service,
                                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
        Invokes the given service with the given pipeline asynchronously (in another thread).
        Parameters:
        service - The service to be invoked.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the service.
        Returns:
        The thread on which the service is being invoked.

      • join

        public static com.wm.data.IData join(com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceThread serviceThread)
                              throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Waits for an asynchronously invoked service to complete.
        Parameters:
        serviceThread - The service thread to wait on to finish.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline from the service invocation executed by the given thread.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when waiting on the thread to finish.

      • join

        public static com.wm.data.IData join(com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceThread serviceThread,
                                     boolean raise)
                              throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Waits for an asynchronously invoked service to complete.
        Parameters:
        serviceThread - The service thread to wait on to finish.
        raise - If true rethrows any exception thrown by the invoked service.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline from the service invocation executed by the given thread.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and an error occurs when waiting on the thread to finish.

      • benchmark

        public static ServiceEstimator.Results benchmark(java.lang.String service,
                                                 com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                                 int count)
        Invokes the given service a given number of times, and returns execution duration statistics. Exceptions thrown by the service are ignored / suppressed.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to benchmark.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the service.
        count - The sample count, or in other words the number of times to invoke the service.
        Returns:
        Execution duration statistics generated by benchmarking the given service.

      • benchmark

        public static ServiceEstimator.Results benchmark(java.lang.String service,
                                                 com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                                 int count,
                                                 boolean raise)
                                          throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Invokes the given service a given number of times, and returns execution duration statistics.
        Parameters:
        service - The service to benchmark.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the service.
        count - The sample count, or in other words the number of times to invoke the service.
        raise - If true, exceptions thrown by the service will abort the benchmark.
        Returns:
        Execution duration statistics generated by benchmarking the given service.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If the invoked service throws an exception and raise is true.

      • ensure

        public static com.wm.data.IData ensure(java.lang.String tryService,
                                       java.lang.String catchService,
                                       java.lang.String finallyService,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Provides a try/catch/finally pattern for flow services.
        Parameters:
        tryService - The service to be executed in the try clause of the try/catch/finally pattern.
        catchService - The service to be executed in the catch clause of the try/catch/finally pattern.
        finallyService - The service to be executed in the finally clause of the try/catch/finally pattern.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the services.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline containing the results of the try/catch/finally pattern.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If the service throws an exception while being invoked, and either no catch service is specified, or the catch service rethrows the exception.

      • ensure

        public static com.wm.data.IData ensure(java.lang.String tryService,
                                       java.lang.String catchService,
                                       java.lang.String finallyService,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                       com.wm.data.IData catchPipeline,
                                       com.wm.data.IData finallyPipeline)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Provides a try/catch/finally pattern for flow services.
        Parameters:
        tryService - The service to be executed in the try clause of the try/catch/finally pattern.
        catchService - The service to be executed in the catch clause of the try/catch/finally pattern.
        finallyService - The service to be executed in the finally clause of the try/catch/finally pattern.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the services.
        catchPipeline - Optional additional variables to be merged with the pipeline before calling the catch service.
        finallyPipeline - Optional additional variables to be merged with the pipeline before calling the finally service.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline containing the results of the try/catch/finally pattern.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If the service throws an exception while being invoked, and either no catch service is specified, or the catch service rethrows the exception.

      • rescue

        public static com.wm.data.IData rescue(java.lang.String catchService,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                       java.lang.Throwable exception)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Handles an exception using the given catch service.
        Parameters:
        catchService - The service to invoke to handle the given exception.
        pipeline - The input pipeline for the service.
        exception - The exception to be handled.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned by invoking the given catchService.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If the given catchService encounters an error.

        public static com.wm.data.IData addExceptionToPipeline(com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                                       java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Adds the given exception and related variables that describe the exception to the given IData pipeline.
        Parameters:
        pipeline - The pipeline to add the exception to.
        exception - The exception to be added.
        Returns:
        The pipeline with the added exception.
